title: What are the subjects offered in BA (hons) economics? - Quora
tags: Bachelor of Arts Degrees in Economics with Honors
Bachelor of Arts Degrees in Economics

response.answer_text: In ECONOMICS honors along with the core papers like macroeconomics ,microeconomics, statistical methods of economics , mathematical economics or econometrics we also have one ed paper which is math or stat and one aecc paper like English or evs. In the first and second sem we have to answer 4 papers each and the number of papers will gradually increase from second year onwards. But in Jadavpur University the main stream subjects in economics are ECO STAT MATH. Hope you find this helpful.

Microeconomics, Macroeconomics, Mathematical Methods for Economics, Statistics, Econometrics, Research Methodology, Data Analysis, Financial Economics, Indian Economics, Developmental Economics. Also in 3rd year, you get 2 optional economics paper which you have to choose from 4 or more papers in total. These are the subjects what Delhi University provides for economics honours, excluding one pass paper.
